resources.string:
Hi, my name is Jim Vincent. 
 I want to improve myself physically and mentally. 

 I want to make use of this summer to build myself as a programmer and as a person. 

 List of things that I want to accomplish by the end of Year 1 summer: 

 Create SNUS (Both front-end and back-end) 

 Finish reading 1984 and hopefully some other books 

 Lose at least 5 kg 

 To pursue the things that makes me happy
